meta.name: description
meta.content: Moreland School District serves K-12th grade students and is located in San Jose, CA.

img.alt: National Blue Ribbon Schools Program Logo - Payne Panthers collaborating on a school-wide PBL Thinking Map.

div.style: position: absolute; overflow: hidden; left: 0px; top: 0px; width: 1850px; height: 950px;
color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 1850px; height: auto
div.p: Welcome back to our staff, students, and families to the 2019/2020 School Year!

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 1850px; height: auto
div.p: Moreland Received Four New Buses through a Grant. Learn more here.

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 1850px; height: auto
div.p: Moreland is thrilled to partner with the San Jose Public Library to provide library cards for all students. Learn more here.

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 1850px; height: auto
div.p: Annually Moreland schools recognize one Teacher, Classified Person, Volunteer, and Management Person of the Year. Click here to see this year's winners.

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 1850px; height: auto
div.p: Easterbrook Discovery Middle School Student Wins National DownBeat Music Award. Learn more here.

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 1850px; height: auto
div.p: Anderson was named a Top Bay Area Public School for raising math scores. Learn more here.

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 1850px; height: auto
div.p: A Payne 5th grade class won a local math competition. Read more here.

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 1850px; height: auto
div.p: Moreland students compete in the District "Fiesta Fit" Future Chef competition. Learn who won here.

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 1850px; height: auto
div.p: The Moreland Board of Trustees invite you to attend their Board Meetings 1-2 times per month. You can view their schedule, past agendas, and more here.

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 1850px; height: auto
div.p: Congratulations to Team CENTER for advancing to the First LEGO Robotics state finals. Read more here.

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 1850px; height: auto
div.p: Easterbrook Discovery Leadership Students organized Breast Cancer Awareness week with activities to support fundraising.

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 1850px; height: auto
div.p: Latimer & Baker participated in the #GlobalCardboardChallenge in October! Thank you to the community for all your donations.

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 1850px; height: auto
div.p: Pedestrian Flags are back at Payne Elementary School thanks to their Panther community.

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 1850px; height: auto
div.p: Latimer Middle School's new building opened up this March, complete with state-of-the-art classrooms and a maker space for middle school students.

img.alt: COVID-19 Update - All Moreland Schools Closed Through June 12, 2020 Thumbnail Image

h1.a: COVID-19 Update - All Moreland Schools Closed Through June 12, 2020

div.div: The Santa Clara County Superintendent of Schools and all County district superintendents have decided to close schools through the end of the school year to help stop the spread of COVID-19.
The shift from in-person classroom instruction to online formal distance learning begins Monday, April 13, 2020. Click here for educational, wellness, and tech resources for families.

img.alt: Special Education Parental Rights and Procedural Safeguards Thumbnail Image

h1.a: Special Education Parental Rights and Procedural Safeguards

img.alt: 2020/2021 and 2021/2022 Student Calendars Available Thumbnail Image

div.div: The Board of Trustees approved the 2020/2021 and 2021/2022 student calendars at the January 14, 2020 Board Meeting. Click here to start planning ahead.

img.alt: Next Board Meeting: April 28, 2020 @ 6:00 PM (through online participation) Thumbnail Image

h1.a: Next Board Meeting: April 28, 2020 @ 6:00 PM (through online participation)

div.div: The Moreland Board of Trustees encourages the community to attend Board Meetings. Agendas are posted 72 hours in advance of a meeting and Comments from the Public can be made at the beginning of each meeting.

img.alt: Parcel Tax Exemption Available for Senior Citizens Thumbnail Image

h1.a: Parcel Tax Exemption Available for Senior Citizens

div.div: Thank you to the Moreland Community for passing Measure G supporting Moreland schools! If you are 65 years or older and are interested in an exemption, click here for more information.

nav.a: Pay my child's food service balance
Know what to do in case of emergency
the most recent mailer to homes

div.p: The Governing Board is committed to equal opportunity for individuals in education. District programs, activities, and practices shall be free from discrimination based on race, color, ancestry, national origin, ethnic group identification, age, religion, marital or parental status, physical or mental disability, sex, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity or expression, or genetic information; the perception of one or more of such characteristics or association with a person or group with one or more of these actual or perceived characteristics. The Board shall promote programs which ensure that discriminatory practices are eliminated in all district activities. (BP 0410)
Jennifer Baldwin, Assistant Superintendent, Human Resources, jbaldwin@moreland.org
For information or complaints regarding Title IX, click here
